UI.Game

Class Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • UI.Game.Grid

  • public class Grid
extends java.lang.Object
    A Grid represents the game field of Tetris.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Grid(int height, int width)
      Creates a new Grid with the given height and width.

    • Method Summary

      Adds a Block to the coordinates represented by the passed Location object.

      Gets the size of the Grid in the format [rows, columns].
      Square getSquareAt(Location location)
      Retreives the Square at given Location coordinates.
      void regularStep()
      Standard update to the Grid; each block is moved one unit down.
      java.lang.String toString()
